name: Konkey Dong: Escape from Queen Q Qrool's Palace
name_original: Konkey Dong: Escape from Queen Q Qrool's Palace
description:
The Huge Mode Productions entry for the nerdifex Indie Game Dev Beginners #002.

Make sure to finish the game before Queen Q Qrool shuts down the escape urn and escape becomes impossibe! She won't tell you when it happens, either.

Credits: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-top-down-basic-1... and of course ALL THE FANS. WE COULDN'T HAVE MADE THIS WITHOUT YOU!
